Clues in the photograph: such as prices labeled in American currency and an English-language sign in the background, indicate it was not taken in Venezuela.
The photograph was cropped to remove the: language sign and circulated on Spanish-language blogs, falsely claiming it was taken in Venezuela.
Several newspapers: including El Nacional, Prensa Libre, and ElSalvador.com, used the photograph to illustrate Venezuela's economic crisis, even though it was unrelated to the country's financial troubles.
